import React from "react"; import { GlobeAltIcon, MapPinIcon, ShieldCheckIcon, UserGroupIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; const About = () => { return (
{/* Title */}

About Us

Building a smart travel platform for unforgettable journeys

{/* Left Content */}

Who We Are

We are a modern travel agency offering a complete digital solution for travelers. Our website allows you to explore destinations, book flights and hotels, and manage your trips with ease.

Our goal is to simplify travel planning by combining technology, trusted partners, and excellent customer service in one powerful platform.

{/* Right Cards */}

Global Destinations

Discover destinations around the world with carefully curated travel options.

Smart Planning

Plan your trips easily using our intuitive and user-friendly booking system.

Secure Booking

Your payments and personal data are protected with secure technologies.

Dedicated Support

Our team is always available to assist you before, during, and after your trip.

); }; export default About;
